questions.questionText:
Write a program to create a class called Student with attributes roll Number, Student Name, marks of three subjects. Calculate the gradePointAverage().
Student("Sangay", "IT201985001", 7.5, 7.0, 8.0) → 7.5
Student("Bidhya", "IT201985003", 8.5, 6.0, 7.5) → 7.3
Student("Kelzang", "IT201985065", 7.5, 8.0, 9.0) → 8.1
